attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the current lack of confidence in which the government is held a general election should be called immediately.

Given the current situation with regard to expenses, those politicians that wish to retain their seats should seek re-election.  As most MP's have acted within both the spirit and the rules of the green book of expenses, those MP's should be able to regain their seats whilst the public can then show their true feelings against those that have broken the rules etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
